fields.description: The base authority for Azure Active Directory authentication.
fields.name: AadAuthority

fields.description: The application/client Id for the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.
fields.name: ApplicationId

fields.description: The intended Audience of the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.
fields.name: Audience

fields.description: The object Id of the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.
fields.name: ObjectId

fields.description: The tenant Id for the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.
fields.name: TenantId
